content: **yarn** 1 skein 100g dk aran worsted or bulky weight for an 8-9 tall adult-sized cowl for smaller or larger cowls your yarn requirements will vary for a marled look you can hold a strand of fingering weight with the base color **gauge & sizing** gauge is not important for this pattern pattern can be adjusted for any sized human **hook & notions** use a hook that is yarn-appropriate and results in the fabric density you prefer suggested hook sizes o us j 6 mm for dk+fingering worsted or aran o us l 8 mm for bulky removable stitch markers optional for marking between single_crochet and half_double_crochet repeats and for identifying the rs of your work yarn needle for weaving in ends **notes** pattern has been written using us crochet terminology cowl is worked sideways and then seamed at the back
